basic_information.scholarship_notes: 2021 Only - this will award $1,000. in the Fall. Possible second award in the Spring.

description: This scholarship was created in 2019 by Andrew and Marilyn Macaulay to provide assistance to a College of Fine Arts and Design undergraduate student who is working to pay for college. Preference is given to art and design majors. Recipients must have a minimum 2.5 cumulative retention GPA and be working a minimum of 15 hours per week. Eligibility College of Fine Arts and Design major Preference given to art and design majors Requirements Minimum cumulative retention GPA of 2.5 Working a minimum of 15 hours per week

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
